name: Fireball: Dragons, Dice and Dares
description:
Must be of legal drinking age to download and use.

First off, we dare you to download this app. Next, you can do what our cards and dice – or even worse, your fellow players – tell you to do. Flip virtual cards, roll virtual dice, and do some crazy stuff. Open this app to play with up to five friends at home or at the bar – and you should probably open up a bottle of Fireball, too. Please enjoy Fireball responsibly.
